11#ifndef RTC_BASE_EXPERIMENTS_MIN_VIDEO_BITRATE_EXPERIMENT_H_
12#define RTC_BASE_EXPERIMENTS_MIN_VIDEO_BITRATE_EXPERIMENT_H_
13
14#include "absl/types/optional.h"
15#include "api/units/data_rate.h"
16#include "api/video/video_codec_type.h"
17
18namespace webrtc {
19
20extern const int kDefaultMinVideoBitrateBps;
21
22// Return the experiment-driven minimum video bitrate.
23// If no experiment is effective, returns nullopt.
24absl::optional<DataRate> GetExperimentalMinVideoBitrate(VideoCodecType type);
25
26} // namespace webrtc
27
28#endif // RTC_BASE_EXPERIMENTS_MIN_VIDEO_BITRATE_EXPERIMENT_H_
